availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, Methodist minister. New Jersey native. Son of Eliza Atkinson. Married to Lucinda Ela. Father of Sarah Atkinson, Mary Atkinson, and Charles Atkinson. Minister in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Methodist minister in Nelson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville District 2, p. 206.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 194.
Kentucky, Death Records, 1852-1965, Film # 7017537, Nelson County, File #3974, January 21, 1929.
Find A Grave, "Rev John Atkinson (1797-1891)," Memorial # 126413874, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/126413874/john-atkinson (accessed February 17, 2019).
